name: Meet culture & art, get your eyes to become your HD camera
description: This trip will take you right to the heart of Sydney and let you experience its culture and art in the perspective of locals. There will be amazing street arts, performance and local food. you will be able to participant and be part of the art or performance if you are interested. you will get to experience what it truly means to be in Australia and see some amazing Australian culture, exhibitions and towns. And If you are into fashion or prefer to do some shopping, you will be visiting some of the amazing boutiques in Sydney e.g. David Lawrence, Cara & Co, Land's End, Belinda, Alfie's etc.
